main_definition: Growth refers to the process of increasing in size, quantity, or value over a period of time.

meanings_and_examples.example: During adolescence, humans experience rapid physical growth as they develop into adults.
The educational program focuses on the intellectual growth of children by fostering critical thinking skills.
The company has shown remarkable growth since its establishment, expanding its operations internationally.
She embarked on a journey of personal growth after her life-changing experience.
